cdb.title: Company database
cdb.explanation: Our company database holds the contact information of many companies (as well as other organisations) for your privacy-related requests.

generator.request-type: What kind of request do you want to generate?
generator.id-data-explanation:
The data you specify here will help the company identify you. Feel free to err on the side of entering less—the company will contact you if they need more details.
Those fields, we know from experience definitely have to be filled in, are marked with an *.
generator.add-dynamic-input-explanation: Want to add more data? No problem: Just select the type of input you want to add.
generator.name: Name
generator.signature-explanation: If you want, you can sign your request. Just keep your mouse pressed and draw into the canvas.
